Taiwan begins extended one-year conscription in response to China threatThe first batch of new recruits began serving their one-year compulsory military service in Taiwan on Thursday after the conscription period was extended from four months due to government concerns about China's rising military threat. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 06:43:08 GMT DE2T7ZMGMVJNRPJBS3K4Q63WXI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-begins-extended-one-year-conscription-response-china-threat-2024-01-25/Fabian Hamacher, Ann Wang世界亚太地区
UK's Cameron tells Israel: More aid needs to be able to enter GazaBritish Foreign Secretary David Cameron said he told Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu that more aid trucks must be able to enter Gaza and an immediate humanitarian pause is needed to help those trapped in a "desperate situation". Thu, 25 Jan 2024 06:05:14 GMT 3AFIENFVIVP45MO2QNE7HSRPQY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/uks-cameron-tells-israel-more-aid-needs-be-able-enter-gaza-2024-01-25/Reuters世界中东
India has not told its defence personnel to pull out from Maldives - navy chiefIndia's government has not told its defence personnel to pull out from Maldives following a request from Male, Indian Navy Chief Admiral R. Hari Kumar told broadcaster CNN-News 18 on Thursday. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 05:37:51 GMT 4OK2HJTEXZJXBE3A2C737C4HJ4 https://www.reuters.com/world/india/india-has-not-told-its-defence-personnel-pull-out-maldives-navy-chief-2024-01-25/Reuters世界印度
Ukraine says it shoots down 11 of 14 Russian dronesRussia launched 14 attack drones and five missiles at Ukraine overnight, Ukraine's air force said on Thursday, with air defence systems destroying 11 of the drones. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 05:29:23 GMT PO3PKSM2KBLLPMQ4Q2HIRDYGXA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-says-it-shoots-down-11-14- Russian-drones-2024-01-25/Reuters世界欧洲
Japan says SLIM moon probe achieved 'pinpoint' landingJapan achieved an unconventionally precise moon landing within a few meters of its target, the space agency said on Thursday, after the nation became the fifth to put a spacecraft on the moon with the weekend touchdown of its SLIM probe. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 05:06:28 GMT OSJQUAIWLNN3BEOL24WILFRCWA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/japan-says-slim-spacecrafts-pinpoint-moon-landing-is-success-2024-01-25/Kantaro Komiya世界亚太地区
Hong Kong's top court overturns acquittal of human rights lawyerHong Kong's top court on Thursday overturned the acquittal of activist and human rights lawyer Chow Hang Tung of inciting others to join an unauthorised vigil to remember victims of China's 1989 Tiananmen Square crackdown. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 04:53:37 GMT 26UZROSLQRLRBLIYGS2C4UEQXA https://www.reuters.com/world/china/hong-kongs-top-court-overturns-acquittal- human-rights-lawyer-2024-01-25/Jessie Pang, Edward Cho世界中国
Japan man gets death sentence for killing 36 in anime studio arson - NHKA Japanese man was convicted and sentenced to death on Thursday for the arson and killing of 36 people at famed anime studio Kyoto Animation in 2019, public broadcaster NHK said. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 04:48:54 GMT F76CYVWR7JMG3ENY2G7ITQ7PCQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/japan-man-gets-death-sentence-killing-36-anime-studio-arson-nhk-2024-01-25/Reuters世界亚太地区
Colonial statues vandalised ahead of contentious Australia Day holidayStatues of British explorer James Cook and Queen Victoria were vandalised overnight in the Australian city of Melbourne. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 04:39:07 GMT 2ADIPSN77FKFLOLFDQYCJNDEA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/colonial-statues-vandalized-ahead-contentious-australia-day-holiday-2024-01-25/Stefica Bikes, Alasdair Pal世界亚太地区
Japan business leaders return to China seeking to bolster cooperationAn unusually large delegation of about 200 Japanese business leaders arrived in China this week to bolster economic relations in the first such visit in more than four years and in the face of geopolitical headwinds that have strained bilateral ties. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 03:48:11 GMT QLX3SX55OFN4LDGXAG33JMVDPE https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/japan-business-leaders-return-china-seeking-bolster-cooperation-2024-01-25/Reuters市场亚洲市场
Taiwan president-elect says he hopes for continued firm US supportTaiwan president-elect Lai Ching-te said on Thursday he hopes that the United States can continue to firmly support Taiwan, as he met the first group of U.S. lawmakers to visit Taipei since he won an election earlier this month. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 02:49:54 GMT RV2GV22CAZJNVIKBEX6H5RZ2HA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-president-elect-says-he-hopes-continued-firm-us-support-2024-01-25/Reuters世界亚太地区
Nearly all US Senate Democrats back two-state solution for Israel and PalestiniansAn overwhelming majority of President Joe Biden's fellow Democrats in the Senate on Wednesday backed a statement reiterating U.S. support of a two-state solution to the Israeli-Palestinian conflict. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 01:23:10 GMT QJTPXK53VBNAFPDAND7F4EXHIA https://www.reuters.com/world/nearly-all-us-senate-democrats-back-two-state-solution-israel-palestinians-2024-01-25/Patricia Zengerle世界
